description: Nice views of the Meduxnekeag River and interesting rock formations. There is a small seasonal waterfall (Van Dine Falls).  Nice Nature walk.
directions: Beginning at the Petro-Can at Exit 185 on Trans Canada Highway, Head West on Rote 550 N for approx. 3.4 km.  Turn left onto Red Bridge Road approx. 2.9 km. Trail head parking with signs on the left.
title: Meduxnkeag Purple Trail
